text: Jean-Jacques Blairon (9 August 1947 – 14 July 2020)Triste nouvelle: J.J. Lionel, l’interprète de la «Danse des canards», est décédé was a Belgian musician active in the 1980s under the name J. J. Lionel. His song, "La danse des canards", is one of the best-selling singles ever in France. ==References== ==External links== *Profile, dailymotion.com; accessed 15 July 2020. * Category:Belgian musicians Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:21st-century Belgian musicians Category:20th-century Belgian musicians
title: J. J. Lionel
